name: Orbital Bombardment (Draschel)
description:
Orbital Bombardment is a top-down shooter about a little, mining spaceship firing at Magma Core, the evil asteroid, to get to the valuable metals hidden within. Orbit around Magma Core to avoid its many asteroid and magma bolt attacks, and fire right back on it.
Deal extra damage by shooting any weak points that appear on Magma Core's surface. Try to pick up any floating hearts in your way to restore any lost lives.
Programmed by Luke Piazza and Billy Nomikos. UI and Audio designed by Cole Kersting. Pixel art drawn by Brennan "Termhole" Schultz.
